item.title: About Me
item.author: hayden.macdonald.8778@gmail.com (Hayden MacDonald)
item.description: I am a Canadian graduate student studying at the University of Western Ontario. In August 2018, I achieved a Master of Science in Psychology and currently, I am transitioning from cognitive psychology to a career in data analytics. I am enrolled in Ivey Business School’s MSc in Business Analytics (commencing January 2019). My interests include research, statistical data analysis, and data visualization. In my spare time, I enjoy cooking, hiking, cycling, SCUBA diving, birding as well as watching films and eSports.
